name: Pipes Maze
description:
The classic pipe connection games with 48 unique levels.
This is an classic pipe connection game in which your objective will be to light the lights. It may sound easy, but you'll see how difficult it'll be to connect the cables to just one source of electricity.

name: Real World RC
description: Racing game where you need to control real RC cars located all over the world. When you start the game you are able to see video from the car and you can control it to drive around the tracks.

name: 9 Maker
description:
3x3 Bingo style puzzle game, 9 Maker.
Be relaxed and enjoy it.

name: Puzzle Cats
description:
Drag and drop cats onto the puzzle board and try to make them all fit! The unique puzzle shapes and ever-evolving challenge will train your brain to think in a whole new way. With every puzzle you solve, the challenge will grow. Can you fit all the cats?
Collect cute new cats as you beat each puzzle challenge to customize your game!

name: Ludo Saga
description: Play Ludo Saga to relive your childhood’s race horse game and join with family, friends even people all over the world!

name: Turbo Kids
description:
Partake in the crazy Turbo Kids tournament and win the ultimate prizes!
An amazing journey full of fantasy and excitement! Turbo Kids are competing outdoors to win ultimate prize. Join in the tournament to see what Turbo Kids can bring you!

name: Assault Bandit
description: Hop into your hotrod and blast up the streets. Fast moving upgrade system keeps you challenged so you can push the limits of speed and unleash some wicked firepower.

name: Dark Rooms
description:
Dark Rooms is an engaging, very addictive puzzle game. With a chilling atmosphere and beautiful design, the game offers an entrancing mix of intriguing puzzles with a simple user interface.
The purpose of this game is to solve riddles to open doors and get out of all the rooms. You may also use the items found in the room to open the door and advance to the next level. Think out the box, can you escape the doors on your own?

name: Words N Words
description: Do you love word games? Do you want something more challenging? Do you consider yourself an expert? Then give Words N Words a try. This word game is one where you find words within another word. How many words can you make from the base word? We’ve included every word we could think of and we’d love for you to play. Start with Beginner where you’ll search for 3 and 4 letter words, move on to Intermediate to search for 3, 4, and 5 letter words, and play Advanced, if you dare. We’re welcoming all Worders to play. Words N Words, Get the Word out!

name: Spelling Go!
description: Spelling Go! is a very simple, unique and challenging spelling bee word puzzle game with 4000+ unique puzzles and more coming. The goal of the game is to guess the word formed by the scattered letters or alphabets on a grid and then form a single spelling flow or link by connecting the letters in sequential order starting from the first letter and ending at the last letter and cover all the squares. You can use single finger to connect letters to form spelling flow or link and solve the puzzle by guessing the word.

name: Math Challenge: Workout Brain
description:
Exercise your self with Kids Math Challenge - Brain Workout and Improve your brain effectively, Increase your intelligence, Make faster decisions.
Play the Fun and Train your Brain that Helps You to Challenge Your Skills.Give quick math practice to solve the questions with fast and increase your score and levels for difficulties.

name: Snaky Squares
description:
Snaky Squares is the classic snake game re-imagined for your phone and tablet.
Eat the yellow balls to score points and grow longer. Eat the arrows to jump. Be careful not to hit your tail, don't fall off the edge and watch your speed!
Earn powers by watching videos. Use your powers in the game to control your speed, collect more dots and shorten your tail.
Snaky Squares can only turn 90 degrees left or right. Tap the the side of Snaky's head to turn in that direction.
If Snaky is heading down and you want to head up you will need to turn twice. You can tap to the right of Snaky to turn once and head to the right, and then tap a second time above Snaky to turn and head up.

name: Hidden Object: Crime in Penthouse Special Edition
description: The game has 20 levels in which you need to show the ability of mindfulness, agility, fast thinking, and precision of your actions.

name: Cubes: Procedural Wonders
description:
Cubes is a simple and addictive puzzle game. The goal is to form a pattern with moving cubes.
It is a fun brain game that demands an intense concentration and requires strong problem solving skills.

name: Beetle.io
description:
Growth - Eat glow dots for increasing size
Survival - Avoid the attach from all the guys that are currently bigger than yourself
Domination - Stomp them all, eat them and become the biggest beetle!

name: Apes.io
description: Apes.io is a multiplayer game where you drop into an endless battle royale armed with terrible ape magic in Apes.io. Collect ancient artifacts and craft one-of-a-kind magical weapons. Discover spells, forge wands, and grow to become the biggest ape on the island!

name: Florifer
description: Open world explorative game focused on growing the last magical seeds that can turn into flowers and bring an abandoned, silent world back to life.

name: Pekko Robot
description: Sin descripción

name: Kronno Zomber
description:
Ready for the race of your life? Become Kronno Zomber and… Run! Jump! Dodge!
But most importantly, don’t let the ferocious horde catch you!

A T-Rex riding a motorbike?
A flying dog shooting missiles?
A flying skateboard?

name: That Endless Night: 1931
description: Sin descripción

name: Angry Birds Double Crossed
description: Angry Birds Double Crossed is an upcoming action-reality game show that was advertised starting on April 6, 2021, surprisingly only on Instagram.

name: Angry Birds Kingdom
description: Angry Birds Kingdom is an upcoming game advertised by Rovio Entertainment on Facebook.

name: The Ape Painting
description:
Tomorrow is the day that you publish your debut novel. But tonight is the night in which your date’s hideous painting has fallen off the wall and killed him, leaving you trapped in an apartment of nightmares - both his and your own.

The Ape Painting blends point-and-click elements into a visual novel structure, and sets you loose in an apartment where everything hates you. So get off your date's corpse, put on some clothes, and get to work. But remember: achieving your dreams might cost more than you think.

name: Frog Quest
description: A simple adventure game on Neocities about a broke college student attempting to catch a frog for a wizard.

name: Neko-sama no Karaguri: Garden kara no Dasshutsu
description: Sin descripción

name: Seigi no Torishirabe
description: Sin descripción

name: Musuko to Oyome-sama: Wakeari Tsuma ha Jirai-kei Doronuma Story
description: Sin descripción

name: Kabedon Kareshi: Manatsu no Charao
description: Sin descripción

name: No Paper!
description: Sin descripción

name: Meitantei no Nazotoki Suuri: Thrill to Suspence no Jiken Kaiketsu Nazotoki Game
description: Sin descripción

name: MagMaze
description:
5 in 1 - Five fun games for the price of one. More than 200 handcrafted mazes.

There are more than 200 mazes of various shapes and sizes; mazes like you've never seen on the iPhone. With MagMaze, easy gameplay lets you simply change the floor color, one square at a time or maybe collect stars while avoiding enemies. Stay alert though because you leave a trail that bad guys will follow.

name: Marble Battles
description:
Remember those times you played marbles with your friends? Relive those moments again, except this time, with Exlosion!
Marble Battles is a turn based puzzler-slash-arcade game. Test your skills against players all around the world! Gather gold from your wins and improve your arsenal with various marble features. The more you win, the higher your rating will go!

name: Mini Speedy Racers
description:
Join the Mini Speedy Racers league and compete against crazy mini mad drivers in this extremely fun and entertaining racing game.

Pick your racer, select your track, and speed up! You can bump against other mini speedy racers, pick up tricks to make fun of them, pick up turbos to speed up, and just make sure to cross the finish line ahead of all them to celebrate.

The game includes many good-looking retro style racers, challenging tracks, several nice cartoonish environments, and many tricks.

name: Race Illegal
description:
The smell of freshly burnt rubber on tarmac, the feel of the soft leather in your hands, the sound of engines roaring and crowds cheering, open your eyes and experience racing in its purest form, get ready to take to the streets in Race Illegal.
Finally the true street racing experience has arrived on your phone. Starting your career as a rookie; you need to earn respect out there before you can challenge the best, work your way through an intense and engaging storyline to prove yourself top dog. With 20 tracks to race, 9 cars to choose from and a whole host of customisations there’s plenty here for the petrol-head to tinker with.
Real driving physics, insane drifts and nitrous boosts and some of the most visually stunning locations to drive around, Race Illegal has it all. Check out your own driving stats and compare your times and honours with other players worldwide.
Have you got what it takes to Race Illegal?

name: Rebound Balls
description:
Leisure game to remove lines of balls which can rebound at the boundary.
Balls with different colors will be dropped onto the board. Tap to choose one ball, and then tap on a target cell to move to when there is a free path. If 5 or more balls in same color are in a horizontal, vertical or tilting line, the balls will be removed and the score will be increased.

name: 99 Cars: Zig Zag Racer
description: Stay on the track in this difficult world, as surviving here can be a lot difficult. Evade from dangers by as many zigzags as you can! Collect gems, complete daily challenges and unlock new Cars ! Just tap the screen to change the direction of the car. Try not to hit the edges! How far can you survive?

name: Absurd
description:
A fast-paced comedy card game fueled by the freaky humor of you and your friends. Fire back answers to far out prompts to make your friends laugh and win their votes. Build your deck from hundreds of cards. Collect cards ranging from rare to ultra rare to just bizarre. Match wits with friends and foes for hilarious online multiplayer action. Perfect for a quick game or hours of play, Absurd lets you show off your funny side and rewards you for not making sense.
Absurd’s multiplayer game play is so simple it’s addictive, but the laughs come from you. Absurd throws out a random question, category or fill-in-the-blank, and you and your friends hustle to answer with cards from your deck, then vote on the winner for each round. An average match lasts minutes, but with collectible cards and the ability to customize your deck, Absurd gives you trillions of ways to keep your friends laughing for hours!

name: Bloom Barrage
description: Join Skip, the energetic mouse lemur, as he progresses to become the Bloom Barrage festival champion. Compete in various fun objectives to learn planting, skill-shots, and power-ups with Serena, the helpful panda. Overcome challenges posed by Thoreau, the grumpy iguana and Connie, the sly lynx. Level up and unlock seed equipment to increase seed projectile speed, plant growth rate, and player movement speed.

name: Carrom Friends
description: Carrom Friends sports game is a sport-based tabletop & carrom board game.

name: Catloons
description: Float to mew heights in this wacky endless floater! Avoid the angry clouds while picking up coins to unlock new Catloons. Collect power ups to help you float even higher!

name: Crime Investigation Escape
description:
Dive into the whole new world of gruesome crime and investigate all the criminal cases.
As the universal investigation board has appointed you to find the mystery behind the biggest crime scene, Now you are the agent for verifying case files. In all the crime games, the criminal tries to escape, but you need to interrogate cleverly and observing criminal minds assign some spy for not missing the true criminals.

name: C.T.R.: Cross The Road
description: He, name is Kuring, is in the middle of road. But, what do we do? Cars running fast, and scary cat coming for Kuring. Please, help him to escape!

name: Deed: Sustainable Business
description:
Deed - the game that develops business strategies and entrepreneurial skills.
With Deed you develop your knowledge as an entrepreneur and investor to make more profitable business.
There are several steps with great content! Your challenge is to become rich and make the highest number of negotiations with other players using the 5 essential resources of the planet: people, knowledge, technology, clean energy and finance. Talent$ is the game currency, more Talent$, better is your position in the wealth ranking.

name: Disco Zombie Fever
description: Running, Racing and dancing on the dance floor just like dear old granny did. Avoid the smoking hot disco fans. Jump over the cool ( and zombie dead ) hand beat. Run past the graves of those dancing before you.

name: Ionscape
description: “Ionscape” is set in a futuristic neon tech environment and is a fast paced sideroller for your mobile and tablets. The game features highly addictive one touch gameplay, and your objective is to collect the coins while avoiding the walls. Roll out!

name: Indie Jane and the Snake Tower
description: Explore the forgotten Snake Tower as Indie Jane, treasure raider extraordinaire! Fast-paced, snake-jumping action! Jump to reach out and collect rubies as you climb up the perilous Snake Tower, guarded by tons and tons of snakes!! Unlock magical relics with spectacular powers that lets you glide mid air and can even save your life!

name: Hidden Object: Golden Trails - Secret of the Princess
description: Join Princess Diana and her younger brother as they unravel family secrets and face breathtaking adventure! Diana has dreamed of finding the hidden gold that her grandmother, hid long ago. When Diana’s parents leave her and her brother Bobby at home for a day, Bobby suddenly goes missing. Solving this strange disappearance is the first step, eventually leading Diana and her brother to an ancient treasure map! Test your skills with challenging puzzles that will take you from strange rooms to the dangerous depths of the ocean. With its charming characters, engaging storyline and plethora of puzzles, this game is an irresistible hidden object adventure!

name: Amazing Jewel Switch
description: Tap or Drag 2 jewel to switch them to eliminate.

name: Army of Ninjas
description: Command your army of ninjas in this addictive strategy board game through battles to locate and capture the enemy's treasure box. Your ninjas are well equipped with big rocks, pieces of paper and pairs of scissors to be able to crush their opposing army. The game blends elements of strategy, anticipation, deceit and luck to provide you with a unique gaming experience.

name: Ball Sort
description:
Sort the balls and clean up the mess!
Press & hold to pull the balls up. Release to drop them. Switch colors to get the balls you want.

name: Fisticuffs: An Arcade Boxing Game
description:
Remember the good ol’ days when a steak dinner cost a nickel, when everyone appreciated the glory of a handlebar mustache and a person’s worth was weighed by how much of a beating they could inflict on an opposing boxer? We don’t remember those days either, but with this fun, arcade boxing game you’ll be transported back to a time when you’re just an uppercut away from fame and fortune!
Fisticuffs features a wide selection of colorful, over-the-top opponents, who’ll each need to be taken down if you expect to end up as the king of the ring. You’ll lead your punching pugilist through a series of intense fights on their way to becoming the ultimate champ!

name: Euchre ++
description: Euchre is a fun trick taking card game with four players. Enjoy many different options and customization like Canadian Loner, Stick the Dealer and more! Also includes a fun variation of Euchre called Bid Euchre with a different ruleset.

name: Swiper
description: A fun and challenging, memory testing, game for all ages. Easy to learn, and hard to master. Watch and listen and then repeat the pattern by swiping to complete each level. Keep track of high scores, and reach new heights.

name: Watee
description: You have a pet named Watee, he just loves bathing and you’re the one to help him with that. The game is a puzzle, based on a physics of water. During numerous levels you’ll need to find a way to fill Watee’s aquarium to make your pet happy.

name: Traffic.io Car Games & Race
description: Realtime multiplayer traffic game. Drift, jump ramps and do stunts. First car smashing io game. Realistic cars with arcade physics. Destroy other cars, earn coins and unlock faster cars and trucks!

name: Tic-Tac-Toe Star
description:
Tic-Tac-Toe Star is like classic tic-tac-toe game but adding strategic thinking.
Get three in a row in the megaboard or win more boards than your opponent to win a match. Eeach turn, you don't pick which board you play on next: that's determined by your opponent's last move!

name: The Sweet Little Monster
description: Meet with "The Sweet Little Monster". "The Sweet Little Monster" is an 2D endless arcade/puzzle game for just to have fun. You are controlling a sweet little monster to catch the falling colored little monsters.

name: Zooted
description: A modern twist on a classic drinking game! Zooted is the perfect get-together game you've been looking for, without requiring a physical deck of cards.

name: Zenfit
description:
A beautifully simple idea, seconds to learn but with a challenge that will last days.
Rotate and flip shapes of the same colour to match them together. Thousands of different screens at eight levels that you can dip into and tackle at your own pace. Can you beat the target score?

name: Word Search: World's Biggest
description:
Find thousands of words in the biggest and best wordsearch puzzle ever! Explore a giant grid of puzzles, with dozens of quests, trophies and secrets to discover.
Hours and hours of entertainment for the dedicated wordsearch fan!

name: PlayM2M
description: Unlock the secrets of magic and become a master in the massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG)! Show your skills to your enemies in epic PVE and take part in brutal Battleground PvP!

name: Mega Man X: Maverick Wars
description: Mega Man X: Maverick Wars is a Mega Man X fangame developed by Pixel Box

name: Castlevania: Seal of the Eclipse
description: A Castlevania fan-game.

name: Furry Shakespeare: Dashing Dinosaurs & Sexy Centaurs
description: Sin descripción

name: Private Crusade
description: Make the battlefield your weapon to vanquish monstrous foes in turn-based, tactical combat. Explore the mysterious Drowned Lands in a tale of heroic fantasy inspired by the arcade classics of old.

name: YinYang Street
description: Set in a small town on the border in the 1980s, "Street" is led by Li Minglai, an active soldier engaged in a homeland defense war. A trip back home in the usual but, Once warm and happy home is now only a mystery, everything points to a mysterious and weird legend - "Yin and Yang street".

name: Batman: Gotham by Gaslight
description: A Batman: Gotham by Gaslight game could've taken fans to the cobblestone streets of 19th-century Gotham, but the project never saw the light of day. A Batman: Gotham by Gaslight game nearly followed the release of 2008's Batman: Arkham Asylum, but the project was sadly canceled before it could see the light of day.

name: Squares & Fruit
description: Squares & Fruit comes in two playing modes. While both modes reward the efficient player, to get a high score, each demands a different strategy. For instance, Classic mode players should conserve moves for the next round; Challenge mode players should match the edges to get higher scores.

name: Parabox
description: Parabox is an award-winning puzzle game that explores a unique recursive system of boxes within boxes within boxes within boxes. Learn to manipulate the world's structure by pushing boxes into and out of each other. Wrap your head around what happens when a box contains itself, and learn to use infinity to your advantage.

name: Octopi: Snow Globe
description:
This is the first version of the Octopi games on the iPad, featuring better than ever game play.
With an interactive tutorial and beautiful graphics, it is the perfect introduction to this series of action games for your brain.

name: Lamp and Vamp
description:
Lamp and Vamp is a roguelike game where you play as a Vampire seeking the castle of his dreams.
Your Vampire is alone against the world! You will need to master the dark arts to find your way to the tomb in each level, where you will acquire new powers.

name: Get! Monster
description:
After summon war, Monsters have no masters, It is a problem to rebuild kingdom. So king recruit heroes for destroy monsters.
Hire and upgrade your heroes, then fight and destroy monsters.

name: Gobble It
description: Gobble equal quantities of good and rotten food for a high score! Gobbling spoilt food does not reduce your score!

name: Fancy Cakes: Merge Adventure
description:
Bake gorgeous cupcakes, delicious cookies, mouth-watering muffins, scrumptious pies, yummy pastries and plenty more! Float your way through amazing towns and immerse yourself in this innovative, addictive puzzle adventure that’s hours of fun for everyone!
Merge and swipe your way through hundreds of fun levels and delightfully charming towns. Discover new tasty recipes and combine dozens of layers of heavenly desserts. Create the most fabulous cakes and share them with friends!
Explore the pastry paradise in this addictive and challenging puzzle adventure! It’s hours of delicious fun!

name: Driver Mini
description:
Are you a new learner-driver? Do you eager to enhance your driving skills? And do you like casual game or challenge yourself? If YES, I think you should like this game.
Driver Mini has a good simulation for real driving\parking, use driving steering and pedal to control you car, like real world the acceleration and deceleration are simulated too, notice that any jerk can smash your car, so be careful.

name: Bowl 'Em Down
description:
Have you ever wondered how a bowling ball feels as they roll down the lane? It's probably terrifying, so i would imagine you'd be screaming, right?
That's kinda what this game is all about.
Try to get a high score in this infinite, randomly generated bowling game.
Another twist is that when you fail a run you are prompted to scream to continue! You can do this infinitely as long as you scream louder than last time. You'll be managing your volume to get the most out of the feature and be screaming your lungs out by the end.

name: Catchy Cheese
description:
Eat all the cheese you can before running out of moves in this clever little endless puzzler.
Discover awesome characters and unleash power-ups as you progress.

name: Balls vs. Maze
description:
Welcome to Balls vs Maze.
Rotate 50 mazes and release 50 balls from each!
Simple controls and satisfying gameplay.
Features fun physics with twisty mazes!
Twist to escape the Maze!

name: All Star Kart Race: Crazy Gear Championship
description: Put on your fire suit and get ready for the ride of your life! Extreme speeds, awesome thrills and spills await as you step onto the track. A brand new go kart awaits you! Can you take home the trophy?

name: Zombie Train
description:
in the not too distant future a virus-stricken world attempts to protect the last reminants of humanity from the infectious spread of a devastating zombie plague.
Nearly all modes of transportation have been shutdown.

name: Up to Clouds
description: Protect your village, don't let the monsters climb down the sky-high bean. Buy traps and upgrade them to the highest level. Wear the strongest armour and always use the right weapon to defeat the enemy.

name: The Azmodeus Project
description: A survival game in an open world of zombies.

name: Windosill: Steam Deck Edition
description: Explore a series of landscapes populated by objects and creatures that come alive with your engagement.

name: Tin Knight
description: An open world adventure that allows you to explore at your own pace and uncover secrets through cryptic clues.

name: To The Rescue!: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Deeper in the Dark
description: You like Sci-Fi games? You like FPS? You like games with secret items, collectables? You like short Indie games? Then you will love this game! The game takes place in a big mothership captured by aliens. Your mission is to kill all the aliens, and blow up the mothership.

name: Little Garden
description: Growth plants on your island and make a delicious meal with these plants. If you have enough gold, you can expand your island! Unlock dozens of cards at each farm level and improve your income. You can make things easier by automating your farm with amazing tools.

name: Endless Railway
description: Use the machine gun to kill zombies to clear the railroad

name: A Mountain of One
description: NYX and AMO1 have collaborated to bring you a fantastic musical VR experience that will have you blown away by the photo-realistic scenery of an otherworldly forest. Line up the AMO1 sign at the beginning and play the debut track from AMO1 - Custards Last Stand from the album - Stars Planets Dust Me

name: Call of Duty: Vietnam
description:
Call of Duty: Vietnam is a cancelled installment of the Call of Duty series that was under development by Sledgehammer Games. It was stated to be taking place in the 1960s and 1970s, in Cambodia, Vietnam and Laos.

The game was planned to be in the action/adventure genre and would've been the first third-person only Call of Duty game. After eight months of development, the game had up to 15 minutes playable, at which point Activision offered Sledgehammer the opportunity to help Infinity Ward in the development of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3.

name: Fitness Gym Bodybuilding Pump
description:
Interested in boxing, fitness and bodybuilding?
Do you dream of becoming the coolest boxer and knocking out your opponents in packs?
Do you want to be the most powerful in the gym?
Download the game and let's get started!
Here is a game that can make your fingers tremble with tension, performing the next approach!

name: Fanais Chess
description:
Command a space fleet to victory!
You are in command of an entire fleet of space ships! Only you can win the battle for your people! Make your foes rue the day they ever meet you!

name: Devil's Peak Fury
description:
Devil's Peak Fury, is an endless race across the wasteland, a race for survival and glory. Speed across the wasteland, pitting your driving skills against countless warriors in nitrous boosted trucks and cars.
See how far you can survive along this mountain wasteland road known as Devil's peak, filled with enemy cars, destruction, carnage and surprises.

name: Groops
description: Groops is a puzzle game that will put your mind to the test. Match tiles three at a time based on either shared or completely unique attributes - the number of possibilities will tie your brain in knots! Keep your mind sharp.

name: Hide-n-Seek
description: Hide-n-Seek is the 3rd game in the quirky series of dueling games that will ultimately challenge your eyes and your memory.

name: Bangalore Auto
description: Twist and dodge out of control traffic including cows,elephants and insane bus drivers as you pick up passengers that throng the roads of Bangalore,India.

name: Charles
description:
Avoid quickly the enemies coming by moving the plane.
It`s not just Dodge. You can kill the enemies with items.
Whose plane will live longer?
You will be a fantastic player if you avoid more than 5 minutes.

name: Connect & Pop
description: As in the original game, the goal of Connect & Pop is for players to connect four or more of their pieces horizontally, vertically, or diagonally. Connect & Pop goes beyond the classic Connect Four game by including a pop mode, larger playing board, five levels of artificial intelligence ideal for all types of players.

name: Pooties
description:
Welcome to the colorful world of Pooties!
Help these cuties to reclaim their stock of food from bad penguins.
Use the power of delicious meals to slide and put penguins in their place!
Drift on ice, collect food to keep going, make spins and slide the longest distance to earn as much coins as you can! Coins will let you buy scratches and win awesome prizes!

name: Sea Monster Simulator
description: Remember the monsters from your worst nightmares? Bring those nightmares to life as you control this huge Sea Monster. Eat all the people you can before the timer runs out. Complete 8 fun missions or go for the high score. Go racing around the beach. Go in search of some great white sharks to eat. Total 3D Sea Monster Rampage!

name: Slappy Limbs
description:
To earn your Black Belt is a simple task...
You only have to survive a four minute battle with Ninja Stars and wooden planks...

name: Speed on the Grid
description: Speed On The Grid is a simple yet very addictive game where you have to keep a ball on the grid by moving it side to side and jumping over gaps to get to the end of each level marked by the yellow platforms! It seems easy at the beginning, but don't be fooled! As you go through the game it becomes more and more difficult, sometimes (almost) Impossible! ...and you have more than 70 levels to solve!

name: Stickman Basketball Blitz
description: Experience pure basketball fun with fast paced gameplay, an astonishing atmosphere, stunning smooth animations, simple controls, insane action and tons of replay value.

name: Swish
description: Swish is a massively multiplayer online basketball game. Your goal is to make as many points as you can in global contests that last 1 minute. At the end of every game, the top 20 player are displayed.

name: The Fifteen Puzzle
description: Drag. Drag. Drag. Get ready for an addictive and challenging game!

name: The Labyrinth
description:
The Labyrinth game where you control the ball while avoiding holes and traps to reach the destination.
50 Gorgeous looking levels with challenging puzzles to solve.
Calibrate and play the way you hold your device.

name: Office Kissing
description:
This is a very interesting game themes, and its operation is very simple.
However, to test your reaction speed, and play when you will feel very exciting.
In the serious business hours, you need to take your time of period which your boss turns back.

name: My Magic 2048
description:
My Magic 2048 is an addictive number game.
Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile,or 4096 tile.
Swipe to move all tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into a larger one. You can choose different type to enjoy. Adventure or time model for you explore.

name: Panel Attack!
description: Connect 3 or more panels of the same color to make them disappear. Pannels appear from the bottom and run to the top, so you must keep them low!

name: The Last Runner
description:
A fast runner that you can play with one hand, tap or double tap to overcome obstacles in your way!
Ray, our hero, is an experienced runner with parkour knowledges. He was born in Cat Town 18 years ago, but today that town is not the same. Now it's an abandoned place, dangerous, with radiactive waters and infected cats...
But Ray is a great runner and adventurer (a bit opportunist), he knows about Cat Town's treasures, there's a lot of coins and hidden treasures and he's ready to collect it all!

name: Ultraviolet Dawn
description:
There is no single predefined way to play - everything is entirely up to you. You chose what you want to be and how you want to play. You can be a peaceful merchant, shuttling goods between stars. You can be an outlaw, attacking innocent ships and capturing their cargo. You can be a smuggler, trading in illegal goods banned by the the Intergalactic Federation. You can even run missions, both legal and illegal.
There is so much to the game. Not only can you upgrade your ships weapons, but you can also upgrade equipment, such as adding more powerful engines or faster regenerating shields. You can even trade your ship in and fly something else entirely, whether a captured pirate ship or a large, bulky cargo carrier.

name: Starblast: 3D Wars
description: Twinstick with 3D graphics.

name: Rottenwood Lake
description: This game was crafted with love in a weekend for the Haunted PS1 game jam.

name: Ukungu
description: Sin descripción

name: Lady Bono!!
description: Sin descripción

name: Naval Creed: Warships
description: Sin descripción

name: Cat Game: The Cats Collector!
description: Sin descripción

name: Training Hero
description: Sin descripción

name: Little Panda's Restaurant
description: Sin descripción

name: American Marksman
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead Spreading: Survival
description: Sin descripción

name: Perfection
description: Players have a set amount of time to match the shape in the center screen. Once they find the match, they have push the large bubble button. Try to match all the shapes before your time is up.

name: Jet Blaster
description: Sin descripción

name: Outnumbered
description: Sin descripción

name: Hotshots Fire Rescue
description: Sin descripción

name: Anchors: Blockade Zone
description: Anchors: blockaded zero is a Cthulhu style 2d shooting game. The game requires players to explore in various maps generated by the program, find and bring back equipment, and live in a base full of doomsday atmosphere. When you explore the map, you see some strange things, calm down. Maybe that's truth!

name: Slot Car HTR+ : 3D Simulation
description: How about a little trip back to the past with one of the most loved toys? Pull the trigger and put your tiny plastic bolide in a low flying in a huge variety of tracks trying to avoid be throw out by the other insane competitors. Start racing in 3 different difficulty levels and 20 tracks that include several challenges like loops, jumps, tricky crossroads, narrows and high speed curves. You can even build your own tracks with the highly intuitive track editor and share your tracks online with others players.

name: Dino Surf
description: Race to the finish with your favorite Webosaur in Dino Surf! Tilt your iPhone screen face up and down to maneuver through obstacles and jump over ramps. You can even run over arrows to get a speed boost, but don’t wipe out! If you make it to the finish line you can move on to the next level, and maybe even make the High Score board. Challenge your friends to play too and see who’s the best at Dino Surf.

name: Betrayed Alliance: Book 2
description: A Sierra-style EGA parser adventure game featuring 2 playable characters lost in a cursed forest.

name: Bog Racer
description:
You have two paths: forward across bridge or over to feed the fish.
In order to avoid falling into water, touch the screen when the car is approaching the edge of the bridge.

name: Tap Soccer: Champions
description:
Tap Soccer is a casual football / soccer game.
Be a superstar on the stadium, and take on the World with your soccer skills. Make sure to win every match as you march towards glory. AI has a challenging simulated football behavior.

name: Freestyle Baseball 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Air Hockey: Championship 3D+
description:
Air Hockey is new funny game with clean and nice design.
The goal is to shoot 10 goals to win!
The game is made for up to two players or you can train alone.

name: The Lilows 2
description: Board game made by people who love games. Because we can.

name: Touch Carrom: Striker Edition
description: Touch Carrom brings favorite carrom board game to the iPhone and iPod Touch. Touch based game controls give the players very realistic game play. The passion and skills transfer very well to the iPhone experience.

name: Kitty & Friends: Blast of Fun
description: Dive into the world with our characters Kitty the Leader, Panda the Chef and Doggy the Athlete and many more! Help our characters in learning and discovering new things, by completing different addictive levels in each story! Blast toy cubes and create bonuses, blast the whole place!

name: Block Brain
description:
Tackle one of the toughest puzzle games available!
Block Brain challenges you to figure things out for yourself. Unlock a dozen different gadgets and use them to solve increasingly difficult puzzles. Only the brave and persistent will reach the end.

name: Eeriest Night
description:
What if you walked into an abandoned building where mannequins tried to strangle you when you weren't looking at them?

Welcome to The Psychological Horror Game of Mannequins in process: Eeriest Night.

Will you discover the secrets of this place?

name: The Front
description: The Front is a survival-open-world-crafting shooter game. Players will assume the role of a resistance fighter sent back in time to stop the rise of a tyrannical empire that has conquered the world using technology based on unknown relics.

name: Jazzy the Frog Goes Home for the Holidays
description: Sin descripción

name: SpookLector
description: You are in an old long forgotten castle with the goal of finding lost treasures. Ghosts will constantly come across on your way - former residents of this castle, who still guarding their belongings. Find all the treasures and get rich!

name: Battle of Darkness
description: Battle of Darkness is a dark fantasy game where you advance by destroying your enemies and fight to re-raise a Kingdom that has succumbed to darkness.

name: Mega Button Soccer
description: Mega Button Soccer is a reinvented version of traditional button soccer! With a fun story and charismatic characters, have fun with Cauã's journey to fulfill his dream of becoming the greatest button football player on Aru-Açu Island!

name: A World to Win
description: A Cold War real-time grand strategy game. Players lead a country through the revolutions and superpower conflicts of the late 20th century, competing in the space race and nuclear arms race, destabilizing and overthrowing rival powers to expand their spheres of influence.

name: Folklands
description: Folklands is a grid-based, relaxing settlement builder with simulated citizens. Grow your settlement from humble beginnings to a bustling town. Harvest resources, manage food supply and make sure your folks are happy, employed and safe.

name: My Alien Roommate
description: When an alien boy named Enoch lands on your balcony one fateful Sunday evening, your life is changed forever. Can you keep your alien roommate a secret from the world?

name: Tsundere Milfin
description: Tsundere Milfin is a lighthearted and quirky match-3 puzzle game combined with a visual novel story. Solve puzzles and make the right choices in conversations to endear yourself and gain the favor of your boss.

name: Capybara Hotel
description: Welcome to Capybara Hotel! As a newly hired employee, your mission is to find the capybaras that are hidden around the hotel. Explore each area of the hotel, using your observation skills to discover where the capybaras have hidden.

name: Dungeon Dash: Tales of the Necromancer
description: Dungeon Dash is a fast paced puzzle arcade where you "Dash" your way through dungeons and maps. Customize your character, unlock new armor and build your town or compete against a friend in a procedurally generated dungeon.

name: Trans Agent X
description: Evil gatekeepers. Transgendered protagonist. Overdue reckoning.This is a casual sci-fi action-adventure bullet-hell dodger about transgender people re-visiting a post-apocalyptic earth and searching for a lost artefact. A wholesome trauma-healing adventure.

name: He Who Watches
description: Manipulate gravity, walk on walls, and use your magical arrow to solve mind-bending puzzles in this grid-based dungeon puzzler. Decipher secrets of the canvas and search for the mythos known as He Who Watches in this continuation of the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2022 winning entry.

name: Eye in the Dark
description: "Eye in the Dark" is a voxel-based horror game where you search for a mysterious eye in a twisted, haunted world filled with jump scares, suspense, and eerie creatures. Navigate maze-like levels, stay alert for surprises and unravel the mystery behind the eye.

name: Jo Jo Wo
description: Jo Jo Wo is a multiplayer battle game. choose roguelike suitable strategy, complete the missions, and take the win.

name: Gigantropolis
description: A short metroidvania with a focus on freedom of choice! Gain abilities to get access to other areas! Help fallen friends to summon their spirits to fight along side you! Level up! Upgrade your equipment! Then when you feel ready, go and confront the mighty Gigantimus to stop him destroying the city!

name: Armoured VR
description: Armoured VR is a Cooperative Multiplayer tank game. Crew up one, or a whole platoon of tanks as a Commander, Gunner or Driver; Alone or with friends and fight through combined arms missions, working with infantry to win one of the most important battles of WW2.

name: Tokyo Neural Groove
description: Tokyo Neural Groove is a pixel art style adventure game, inspired by old school point 'n click games and classic interactive fiction. It is a game inspired by a story that tells a tale of strange characters living in Tokyo in the year 2116.

name: Virtual Chemistry Lab
description: This is a serious game. Made for educational purposes. It was made in order to enable students to understand the high school chemistry curriculum and to provide equality of opportunity.

name: The Fabled
description: DARK FANTASY ACTION RPG. Join The Fabled, a league of Warriors, Gods, and Demons who traverse the Abyss in seek of wealth and power. A new dark fantasy experience with brutal combat, dragon riding, and an evolving world with each season.

name: Scrap Bastion
description: Scrap Bastion is a strategy tower defense game where you manage your city, equipping it to survive the waves of mutant creatures, testing your planning and decision making capacities at every turn. Watch out, as time is crucial to win!

name: Magic Potion Liberators
description: A survivor-style rogue lite action game that gives you a comfortable feeling of being a warrioress. Knock down the onrushing monsters and push forward deep into the enemy territory! There are a wide variety of potions you can create as you Lv up. Create powerful builds & smash the witch's servants!

name: Minos Station: Escape Room
description: You are trapped in one of minos games, an escape room creator, you have several puzzles to solve, and several clues to follow to solve those puzzles, but each time you go to the next escape room, the puzzles are more complicated.

name: Hunting Pearl Creek
description: Hunting Pearl Creek is a 2d platform game. You make your way along the creek through 9 challenging levels. There are many obstacles and dangers along the way. The challenge is to survive and hopefully reach the cabin.

name: Sushi Warrior: Secret Plan
description: "Sushi Warrior: Secret Plan" is a 2D side-scrolling platformer game. With precise physical simulation, this game will put your skills and patience to the test. But be warned, this game is not for the faint of heart.

name: My Fake Goblin Wife
description: You have the opportunity to become the husband of the Goblin Baroness. But what are your chances if this love is a sham?

name: Ningyou Genkai
description: Avoid or defeat dolls that move when you're not looking, take their bodies, and make your way to the 399th dimension. This is a short horror game of fear and strategy, an exploration survival horror.

name: Project Null
description: You wake up in a dark forest and you don't know how you got here and you don't remember anything. But somehow everything changed. You meet strange creatures and no one is very friendly in this alien world. Everything in this place are out to quickly end your little journey.

name: Nandemoya of Flower Street
description: Freely create your own fighting style, find the right target on the busy street and knock it down. As long as you complete the girl's commission, you can get the intimate reward you are eager for.

name: Zom: Rise of the Apocalypse
description: Zom: Rise of the Apocalypse is a post-apocalyptic Trading and Collecting Card Game that combines strategic PvP multiplayer battles and an immersive RPG single player story. Build your perfect army with cards and abilities recieved in battle or design new ones in the lab using gene programming.

name: Crazy Designer
description: A strategy and simulation game about interior design. The player has to make the perfect arrangement of compartment, furniture and decoration to satisfy everyone's different request. 9 topics and more than 1200 items in the game.

name: Cosmo's Pizzarama
description: Craft fresh slices to restore order to the galaxy.

name: Chronicles of TalDun: The Longing
description: A kinetic novel about two magi learning how to live with the burden they each carry. Explore Tal'Dun—a world of dark magick and primordial beings with unfathomable power. Follow a mysterious phenomenon as it turns the world upside down in a way not even magi would be prepared for.

name: Retro Life
description: create the life of your dreams, in this classic real time life simulation/rpg game. will you become the success story to make your parents proud? or a hopeless loser? the choice is yours

name: Hostile Dreams
description: Play through your gloomiest dreams in this challenging ragdoll platformer! Learn and survive the levels, collect dream shards to unlock extra challenges

name: Fight With Keys
description: A combination of action and rhythm games, players need to move characters while entering corresponding keys.

name: To Pixelia
description: Experience the ultimate life simulator in To Pixelia. Create your own story, choose your character's look and design your home. Climb the career ladder, compose songs, cook, fight, drive and take care of your health. Live the life you've always wanted.

name: Blood 'N Bullets
description: Blood 'N Bullets is a top down roguelike shooter where your ammo, health and currency are one and the same. You play as a vampire stuck in a prison and have to shoot your way out while your "friend" helps you with upgrades.

name: Kabuto
description: In this game every move matters, kabuto and a pixel art puzzle game where you control a samurai who seeks revenge in a world where only the strong survive.

name: Eat Your Fucking Soup
description: A comedy Horror FPS about a soup company releasing a new soup at just 10 cents a can! Unbelievable value! With the economy in crisis, the new Soup offering has millions queuing around the block to fill up on cheap & tasty food. But something doesn't taste right!

name: Rebirthing
description: Rebirtning - is an exciting sandbox where you can build, break and do whatever you want!

name: Rocket Angels Inc
description: Rocket Angels Inc is a fast-paced arena shooter utilizing a grapple hook focused movement system. Gracefully move around the map and knock your opponents out of the arena using explosive based weapons or perform executions while they are stunned to guarantee victory.

name: Saint Warner's Angels
description: Howdy partner, welcome to Warner's Pass! In this Western turn-based RPG, get ready to fight unseen creatures, high school drama queens, and a shady underground criminal society, accompanied by stunning, hand drawn battle sequences that offer you plenty of choices to approach battles in your own way!

name: Spellfire Odyssey
description: Spellfire Odyssey is a multiplayer strategy game featuring PVP battles using spell casting. With a unique spell-making mechanic, adding strategy and creativity to gameplay. It offers fast-paced battles with various spell combinations for players of all skill levels.

name: Backrooms: The Project
description: Backrooms: The Project is an immersive first-person found footage horror adventure game. Explore the different levels of this mysterious liminal dimension known as the Backrooms, finding and utilizing items to aid you in your escape. Be careful though...you are not alone.

name: Mimic Hunters
description: Mimic Hunters - is a game in which you have to become an mimic or a hunter.An exciting game for a company of friends and new acquaintances.

name: Stellar Insurgency
description: Explore a galaxy of 300 systems as you control your fleet in a top-down 3D style, navigating through Star-lanes, Warp gates, and Black holes. Customize and upgrade your fleet, complete missions, hire your crew, wage war and determine the fate of the galaxy in this grand sim saga.

name: Residuum
description: Defend your base on Mars from invaders in Residuum. A thrilling mix of tower defense and shooter gameplay, upgrade weapons and choose your crew for a unique experience each time. Play with a friend for even more excitement!

name: HeroVersus
description: HeroVersus is a PVP esport grade online fighting game with rollback netcode. The game inherits the fighting game trandition from the arcade era, with 2 joystick control & no F2P upgrades. Its a ture fair fight between player skills & wits!

name: Rogue Realms
description: Rogue Realms is an empire building game in which you place tiles to expand the world and build on those tiles to gather the resources you need. Rogue Realms features full 3D pixel world to explore from any angle. Explore new biomes and buildings to grow an empire to stand the test of time.

name: Cream War
description: This is a physics party game, where you can cooperate with your friends to complete missions (interactive damage) in a cute piece of gameplay. There is more player UGC content waiting for the player to build.

name: Thief of Smiles
description: Thief of Smiles is a 2D physics puzzle game with stealth elements. Move lamps, fling barrels, tie up enemies and swing through levels. But be sure to stay hidden in the shadows. All you need for this is your chewing gum companion Ponti. Uncover the dark secrets of the Smiles Savings Bank!

name: Holy Ocean
description: Ride your bike through the ocean of meat, alone or with friends. Raiders on your tail. They built a tower on that head island. Sneak in. Take down their leader. Destroy the whole island if needed. It is all for the love of Rose

name: CardShark
description: CardShark is a roguelike card-battler game in which you take the role of a young daring shark, seeking adventure. Battle your way through each floor of a dangerous dungeon in an endeavour to reach the bottom...

name: CtrlC
description: CtrlC is an arcade game with the look of the 80s and the technology of today. You have to reach your goal, level by level. The coders among you know: Ctrl+C cancels a running program in the terminal. You might need that info sometime.

name: Stagehand Survival Simulator
description: Simulator style game that takes you behind the scenes of the entertainment concert industry.

name: Radical Road
description: A casual, arcade, one button game about getting a car to go as far as it can on an infinitely procedually generated road, while collecting coins.

name: Polar Penguin
description: Help the lost penguin find his way home to his family. Magnetize your way through obstacles along the journey and avoid possible dangers on your path. This game is a short physics based platformer using magnets to traverse yourself and your surroundings.

name: Fortress VR
description: FORTRESS IS BACK WITH VR! is multiplayer artillery shooting VR game. Choose unique tank characters and face other players in thrilling PvP strategy and action! The realistic battle scene in front of you awaits!

name: Walk and Stroll
description: Take a brief stroll in the beautiful walking-sim, adventure game: Walk and Stroll! See the sights, find items, and interact with things around town to make the impassable passable.

name: Chronicles of Time: Timeline Zero
description: Travel back in time and unravel the mystery of humanity's extinction in Chronicles of Time: Timeline Zero. Play as Azura, a skilled warrior with time-manipulation abilities, and defeat the rogue AI, Crimson, in an epic battle for the fate of humanity.

name: MoonScavenger
description: The main character also dreams of becoming a billionaire, leaving behind a gloomy future that seems to be just an ordinary life on Earth, investing all the money he had in moon tickets and a moon cleaning company, and embarking on a long journey penniless.

name: Pinewood Valley
description: Pinewood Valley is a Single Player, First-Person Open World Horror. Set in 2006, you play a young male who returns to his hometown and finds the whole town has vanished or being killed by a group of unknown killers. You must Run, Hide or Fight to uncover what happened in Town of Pinewood Valley.

name: Water Tank
description: A year had almost passed since my wife disappeared. It has been raining in a cloudy sky. Every day the phone rings with calls from his wife's mother inquiring about her whereabouts. Various rumors have begun to circulate in the neighborhood about his wife's sudden disappearance.

name: Erophone:Re
description: Erophone is returned and renewed from its original. The conflict between humans and ajin girls continues to escalate in the NORMAL city, the organizations behind the scenes are eager to move. The choice is in your hands whether to help the girls or to hunt them down.

name: Game Collecting Simulator
description: In "Game Collecting Simulator", play as the new collector in town, Thomas. Interact with other game enthusiasts and hunt for the games you want. This is a short visual novel featuring casual gameplay.

name: Sahara Storms WWIII
description: Sahara Storms WWIII is a multiplayer tactical First Person Shooter based on modern current environment. Offering objective gameplay where every player plays their part to win. Whether if you are a Assault, a Support, a Medic or Recon Class each role is important.

name: Desperate Survival
description: Fight against Hordes of Zombies, Skeletons and other creatures to survive as long as possible. Upgrade your arsenal and rescue other Survivors on your DESPERATE SURVIVAL.

name: World of Mana
description: You can play with many people with a map made with the map editor and share the created map. You can set up individual or team battles and become a team together to catch monsters, escape mazes, or fight each other. Create a map using the map editor in World of Mana and enjoy it together.

name: My Friend, the Catgirl
description: A dating sim with catgirls. Check out the hot pics of your girl friend!

name: Misaligned
description: Classic 80s inspired shooter

name: Lokaa
description: A first-person adventure game about Lyra, a woman who travels to a fabled tower in hopes of fulfilling a wish.

name: Dragons Heart
description: You've been given the power to peer into people's inner hearts. It's now up to you to empathize and understand each person by helping them with their trauma. Saving the world one relationship at a time! Beware there are some who only seek misery it'll be up to you to determine their fate.

name: Dark Age Empires
description: Dark Age Empires is an open world survival game that can be played in single player mode or as an online multiplayer game on a dedicated server.Do you have what it takes to not only survive in this dark age, but to rise up, fight back and create your own Dark Age Empire?

name: Dystopian Debugger
description: Dystopian Debugger is a puzzle game about debugging murderous robots.

name: Before Resignation
description: It is a game in which the main character, who suffered from stress after being unfairly treated at the company, takes revenge the day before leaving the company.

name: Reflexia: The Archetype's Room of Three Walls
description: The story in this game that's missing the fourth wall and the roof starts from pantsu jokes and ends with your depression. Play at your own risk!

name: Kazak
description: In this retro inspired turn-based RPG, customize your battle skills, test your reflexes and blast your way through hostile environments. With multiple level routes, story paths, endings and more, no two playthroughs will be alike.

name: Bombo Rumble
description: Bombo Rumble is a 4 player local - multiplayer game where you throw bombs with physics at your foes. Battle in 12 different arenas, use a variety of weapons and power ups to blast away your friends or play against Bots

name: AInder
description: What is AI? What is love? In Ainder, you will be able to swipe “Like” or “Nope” on characters created by AI. They sometimes send photos that might excite you. Through communicating with the characters, the human and the AI will learn and adapt.

name: Mauled
description: Mauled is a first-person survival horror game where players are stuck in an endless loop of death trying to escape a horrific late-night shopper...

name: Betray Me Not
description: Control your feline friend to cooperate by playing mini-games and avoiding being turned into gold by other greedy cats.

name: Death Race Outer Space
description: Fast paced 3d multi-player/single-player shooter which can be played both in online as well as split-screen modes. Players race against each other through the trenches of space in a gameplay style which rewards spontaneity, shooting and athleticism in a dynamic and complex environment.

name: Punt
description: In Punt, gravity is at your fingertips -- discover the abilities of the E.M.M.A. in this new and innovative first-person puzzle platformer running on the Source Engine!

name: Phase Line: Raider Assault
description: Phase Line: Raider Assault allows players to jump into high adrenaline combat arenas in various fictitious environments around the world. Partake in tactical battles in third-person perspective to battle with other online combatants for victory.

name: Ancient Arrow
description: Action Bow Shooting in this squad-based VR Battle Royale

name: Loya
description: Loya is an open world, multiplayer RPG with dynamic combat, crafting and a procedurally generated world! Play alone or with your friends with private servers!

name: Bow Climb
description: Join players from around the world in a gauntlet of challenges you and your bow must overcome. Bow climb is a social climbing game. It'll take time but you'll be able to do it!

name: Finding Fern
description: Finding Fern is an Action Adventure RPG with an emphasis on story and dialog. Your party members will talk to each other as well as many people and denizens they meet along the way.

name: Railway Company Owner
description: Railroad Tycoon is a puzzle train simulator video game. build a railway city bigger and more complex than anyone could ever imagine. Build your city into the biggest railroad city in the world.

name: Lovelorn Sanatorium Ⅲ
description: This is a spoof plot puzzle game. Click the dialogue to advance the plot. There are many puzzle-solving levels in the game. You can find props by exploring and solve puzzles according to the game prompts

name: Starstruck
description: Navigate the world of show business as a talent agent, helping your clients become stars, and maybe even fall in love. With unique party card 'battles', deckbuilding, and narrative choice, 'Starstruck' offers a blend of strategy and romance for a relaxed but intelligent gaming experience.

name: Torpedo Boat
description: Take control of one of the most dangerous American ships during World War II and become a capitan of the elite crew of torpedo boats. Patrol sea, explore places and destroy enemy naval units. Become a real captain and make history!

name: AGIS
description: AGIS - A Game In Space is a top-down twin-stick-shooter.

name: Squirrel and Nuts
description: The squirrel is about to go for the winter. To do this, she needs to find a new home and collect the required number of nuts. Help the squirrels with this. You are going on a big trip.

name: Roots of Rebirth
description: At the heart of an underground world, take control of a Slider to help ISA deploy her roots to reconnect with her past and escape from the planet where she is trapped.

name: Smeesa Street
description: Smeesa Street is a branching visual novel and an interesting way to spend time for those who enjoy atmospheric horror stories. Message us and you'll forget about your troubles. You'll be drowning in happiness. This is your path to endless joy.

name: B.C. Piezophile
description: B.C. Piezophile is a first-person action horror game set deep underwater. It features a foreign ocean brimming with ambivalent environments, hazardous anomalies and baroque ecosystems. Stranded in the hadal zone, the player must ascend over 6,150 AeC before they can dream of rescue.

name: Climb Fling
description:
A fun physics climbing game all about flinging!
50 levels, customizable characters, puzzles.

name: Safari: I-Evolution
description:
Safari: Evolution has High quality graphics and gameplay, hunt by foot, 4x4 Jeep, Motorbike, Boat or Horse - your faithful friend - Whistle to Call.
Explore this open world full of deadly wild animals and watch out for the carnivores:
Rhino, Elephant, Lion, Zebra, Giraffe, Lioness, Reedbuck, Buffalo, Wildebeest, Flamingo, Lemur, Bee's, Crocodile, Piranha, WartHog, Monkey, Ostrich, Meerkat, Snake, Scarabs, Hyena, Hippopotamus, Leopard, Impala, Eagle and Gorilla.

name: SnowBall Champions
description: Enjoy winter on your device.Become a SnowBall Champion and Throw snow,slide,hold,evade and drag on the snow in hilltop.Knock out the players with a snowball and gain knock out points to unlock other snowball champions.

name: Cowhop
description: Cowhop is the most awaited game from cowbelly studios! A 2D action platformer where you defeat enemies, collect powerups and reach space while vibing!

name: Jump Lover
description: Welcome to "Jump Lover" game! Click on the phone screen! ready go ! Stack Jump To Dear girl ! Very simple and fun game. More levels and world wait for you to adventure!

name: Infinity Toss
description:
"Infinity Toss" is a game you can enjoy using only one finger.
It's easy and fun. It's never difficult to play.
Just shoot the ball at the basket.
Check the wind direction before the shooting.
Get more coins to purchase new balls.

name: Fight Arena Online
description: This game will make you a real fighter! Gather your friends, choose your character and upgrade their equipment and special attacks. Prove to everyone in the world that you are the best fighter. Online fights with other fighters, unique attacks for every character, combos, jumps and rolls, fireballs, frost spells and lightning. Complete the Challenges mode where you have to show your skills.

name: FoxTrotte
description:
FoxTrotte makes you play Mr. Fox chasing Mr. Crow, the stealer of his beloved cheese!
He sees his soulmate fly away in the evil talons of his nemesis!
Be quick, help him get his precious wheel of cheese back!

name: Slash Them All
description:
Decapitate zombies and play basketball with their heads to score as many points as possible!
More than twenty characters are to unlock!
Grab your sword and go!

name: Karate Do
description: The epic Karate Do world awaits you. Step into the place where only the chosen ones fight. Gather the wisdom of Sensei through great challenges along, master your skills and become a legend of martial arts. Are you sure you have trained enough?

name: Gravity Mike
description: Gravity Mike is an adventure game in which you are locked in a maze. You have to find the magical object to unlock the exit and then to find your way out...

name: A Frantic Santa Situation
description:
Have you ever procrastinated? Well Santa has, and now he needs your help! It’s Christmas eve, Santa’s elves have all gone on strike and he’s depending on you to help him get all the presents out for Christmas!
Race the clock and go for the high score in this insanely addictive action packed arcade game. Push as many gift boxes out the door before your reindeer take off without you! Don’t forget to choose your presents wisely. Each comes with different rewards.

name: Snack Time for Caterpillar
description:
It's Snack Time! Help Caterpillar eat as much fruit as possible!
As you progress, the seasons pass and those pesky dragonflies come to bother poor Caterpillar! Tilt your iPhone/iPod Touch to dodge the dragonflies, then engage monster mode to turn into a dragonfly eating machine! But be careful, Caterpillar's energy will run out, so you'll need to keep eating fruit to charge up!

name: Cats Fighters
description: Cats Fighters is an epic game of free fight girls fighting in bikinis in the best beaches in the world, playing the world of women's wrestling or if you prefer can depute in his quick fight mode, ye dispute a fight training, fight against 12 amazing girls and feel the power in your fists, performs amazing special attacks, improve your fighter and skills.

name: Random Dice: Go
description:
Random Dice: Go is a real-time, auto-battle strategy game where every choice matters.
Claim victory by countering the opponent's strategy and placing the right Dice in the right place.
Always think strategically about your next move.

name: Strike Pose
description: Cooperative jump-posing for 1 to 10 players.

name: Village and Farm
description:
Love farming in the Middle Ages?
Immerse yourself into the best Middle Ages farming game on mobile! Explore the unique way of farming in the old world.

name: None Tank Age
description:
Can you image a tomato is running to you someday?
Join in on the fun and create the best weapon ever!

name: Rock the Goat
description:
Meet Barry, the goat who was born to balance!
Rock your way from the depths of the jungle, to a cyber-city, through space (not time), dressed as characters like Scubarry, Barry-Bot 3000, Private Barry & many more! Help him tiptoe, hop and slide as he collects coins to unlock his alter egos and their exotic locations.
How long can you Rock The Goat?

name: Starlit On Wheels: Super Kart
description:
Welcome to the ride of your life with the heroes from Starlit Adventures: Bo and Kikki!
Help Bo and Kikki on a thrilling chase to recover the stars that the villain Nuru has stolen to power his magical motor.

name: NomNomNom!
description:
This is Pug #1 and he is really hungry! The only way to make him happy is to feed him as fast as you can. Do it properly and as Grandma pug says: “Chomp to nom if you want to be a good bloke, otherwise bad things will happen and you’re going to choke!”.
Fist endless game by the Squarefrog Games gang. Endless and delicious! Beat your own score and save the pug from starvation.

name: Gen 2.1. No Escape
description: Delve into a VHS-style single player FPS experience blending survival horror and classic horror. Battle against Shaggoths and Necrozombies as you collect resources and fight to survive, all while uncovering the terrifying secrets of H.P. Lovecraft's "In the Mountains of Madness".

name: Meowter Space
description: Meowter Space is the quintessential space cat experience. Explore, build and battle your way through space with your fellow feline friends - facing danger of catastrophic purr-portions.

name: Orb Devils
description: A short experimental deck building roguelike! Use Attack Cards on enemy intentions to weaken their attacks, Use Heal Cards on status effects to increase their effects! Play as Demon bounty hunters looking for their Target as you combine and use Card orbs.

name: Mystery Legends: Phantom of the Opera - Collector’s Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixel Wars
description:
Test your strategy skills in an intense real-time battle with friends. With just enough units and buildings to keep it exciting, you can jump into an online multiplayer game the moment that perfect Steam invite arrives!

Get ready to enjoy the simplicity! With only five building types and six unit types, you don’t have to worry about feeling bogged down—now it's time for some fun.

Discover an uncharted world with each map you generate! Unlock new levels of excitement as you journey through unpredictable landscapes and ever-changing challenges.

With just one click, you can challenge your Steam friends to a thrilling online match! Have fun and prove yourself the ultimate gaming champion.

Now you can make quick work of commanding your troops with our intuitive control system. Select and group units without the hassle, so that military tactics come to life right before your eyes!

Step back in time and explore the world of pixel art. With our retro graphics, you can experience a classic aesthetic while still staying clear and readable - it's fantastical fun!

name: Hold Position:Zombie
description: A six-checkerboard tower defense game. According to the characteristics of the soldiers and the changing terrain, and with limited resources, you can arrange the formation with the arms to create a steel defense line, resist the zombies coming in like a flood, and guard your headquarters

name: Piratopia: Raiders of Pirate Bay
description: Set sail in the open seas and plunder solo, PvE or PvP. Trade goods for ship upgrades or equipments to hunt the Kraken, all in the same Server. Dominate by yourself or with maties.

name: Tennis Challenge
description: Sin descripción

description: Superman: Battle for Metropolis is a cancelled Game Boy Color game.

name: Frogger
description: Frogger is an unreleased Sega Game Gear game, developed by S-Plan and set to be published by Sega in 1991.

name: Quake
description: A cancelled Game Boy Advance port of Quake.

name: Monday Night Mania
description: What are you doing this FRIDAY? At NIGHT time, we will be getting FUNKIN on the DANCE floor! Who will be the best?

name: RealSports Volleyball
description: Atari 5200 port of RealSports Volleyball.

name: Miniature Golf
description: A 5200 port of Miniature Golf.

name: Ultra Blade
description: Defend Mankind's last city from the endless hordes of darkness! Ultra Blade is a horde survival RPG with rogue-lite progression elements. Build new heroes to take on new challenges while cutting through 1000s of foes at once. New heroes unlock new powers, making runs more dynamic the more you play.

name: The Entity Within
description: The Entity Within is a echolocation Hardcore Stealth Horror game, each map has its story and each monster (called entities in the game) has different powers. Join this atmosphere and try your best.

name: Midnight Pool
description: Cellphone port of Midnight Pool.

name: Lemmings
description: This unreleased prototype was a planned arcade machine that reached a playable build, but never released to the public. The good hardware allowed the game to run a little faster. The intro was also a little redone, and a tutorial slideshow was introduced to quickly show people the basics at an arcade. It was planned to release in 1991.

name: Midnight Bowling 3
description: A bowling game by Gameloft.

description: A romance mobile game by Gameloft.

description: A romance mobile game by Gameloft.

description: A mobile puzzle game by Gameloft.
